title: special characters causes external local mount to fail.
body:
hi!

having a file or folder with special characters (in my case swedish ã¥ã¤ã¶ã…ã„ã–) will cause the local external mount to fail. however there also seems to be a requirement that another normal file also exists beside it otherwise owncloud only reports no file found.


### expected behaviour
files and folder with special characters should be displayed.

### actual behaviour
owncloud reports an error when having a mount containing a file or folder with special characters beside normal files. it reports no file found if only a single file with special characters exists.

### steps to reproduce
1. create folder x.
2. create a file or folder within x containing the special character "ã¤".
3. create an empty text file with normal characters in folder x.
3. mount folder x.
4. enter the mounted folder in owncloud file view.

### server configuration
operating system: windows vista x64
web server: apache httpd 2.2.25
database: postgresql 9.2.4-1
php version: php 5.4.17 vc9 (thread safe)
owncloud version: 5.0.9

### client configuration
browser: firefox 22.0
operating system: windows vista x64

### logs
#### web server error log
[sun jul 28 21:39:22 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php fatal error:  call to undefined method mdb2_error::fetchrow() in c:\\apache2.2\\htdocs\\owncloud\\lib\\files\\mapper.php on line 128, referer: http://localhost/owncloud/index.php/apps/files?dir=

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
{"app":"php","message":"call to undefined method mdb2_error::fetchrow() at c:\\apache2.2\\htdocs\\owncloud\\lib\\files\\mapper.php#128","level":4,"time":1375040365}
